text:

2. Address racism/bias
3. Protect access to care

#2019CLCpic.twitter.com/t3tNfQ0WE3

html: Look at Readler’s record. He: •Worked to dismantle protections for ppl w preexisting conditions •Led efforts to end #DACA •Opposed protections against discrimination for LGBTQ Americans •Defended restrictive voting laws I’ll be voting “no” on his nomination to 6th circuit.
text:
Look at Readler’s record. He:

•Worked to dismantle protections for ppl w preexisting conditions
•Led efforts to end #DACA
•Opposed protections against discrimination for LGBTQ Americans
•Defended restrictive voting laws

I’ll be voting “no” on his nomination to 6th circuit.

1 year ago our hearts broke for the 17 people killed in the Parkland shooting.
 
Their lives—along with their futures, hopes, dreams—unjustly stolen.

#ParklandStrong

html: To correct 2 big inaccuracies: 1) Our bill uses a process that has been used 1000s of times to pay contractors. It’s not new & argument that it'd be $$$ to implement is bogus. 2) We've been working on this for weeks—idea that we brought this to the table too late is just false.https://twitter.com/thehill/status/1095742417003794432 …
text:
To correct 2 big inaccuracies:

1) Our bill uses a process that has been used 1000s of times to pay contractors. It’s not new & argument that it'd be $$$ to implement is bogus.

2) We've been working on this for weeks—idea that we brought this to the table too late is just false.https://twitter.com/thehill/status/1095742417003794432 …

html: A deal to keep gov’t open is almost done. One of the last issues on the table: back pay for contractors (like custodians & security guards). 800k federal workers got backpay. This is no different. We only have a few hours. Make your voices heard so we can get this done.
text:
A deal to keep gov’t open is almost done.
 
One of the last issues on the table: back pay for contractors (like custodians & security guards). 800k federal workers got backpay. This is no different.
 
We only have a few hours.
 
Make your voices heard so we can get this done.

html: This shutdown is a waste & increasingly harmful. We need to reopen the government. I stand in solidarity with the 1000s of workers and contractors going without pay, so I will be donating my Senate salary for the duration of the current shutdown to The Advocates for Human Rights.

It’s day 14 of Trump’s shutdown. Some ppl who could be hurt most: low-wage federal contractor employees.

html: Minnesota has a tradition of welcoming those coming to US to escape violence & build better lives. We believe all should be treated with dignity and respect. html: I was told not to talk to any of the 2,700 children being held at Tornillo detention center because it would disrupt them. The *real* disruption going on here is the detention of these kids. This is not how we should be treating children.pic.twitter.com/Y663AT0kW9
text:
I was told not to talk to any of the 2,700 children being held at Tornillo detention center because it would disrupt them. 

The *real* disruption going on here is the detention of these kids. This is not how we should be treating children.pic.twitter.com/Y663AT0kW9

html: This morning I was at the border of Texas and Mexico at the Tornillo d​etention center. The kids in this center should be with their families, but instead we're holding them in detention in the Texas desert. I'll be sharing more later. These stories need to be heard.pic.twitter.com/EFo6fqZy8e
text: This morning I was at the border of Texas and Mexico at the Tornillo d​etention center. html: On the eve of last day to sign up for health coverage, threats are being made abt critical health care millions rely on. ACA is still the law of the land. Today is the last day to sign up for Jan. 1 coverage in MN through @MNsure. If you’ve already enrolled, you have coverage!
text:
On the eve of last day to sign up for health coverage, threats are being made abt critical health care millions rely on.

ACA is still the law of the land. Today is the last day to sign up for Jan. 1 coverage in MN through @MNsure. If you’ve already enrolled, you have coverage!

html: I spent yesterday visiting two detention centers—they are billed as residences, but that is the wrong word. Residences are where people live. These places are jails. html: Ruling by federal judge in TX to undermine historic health care legislation—if the decision is allowed to stand—would be catastrophic. It would rob millions of health care coverage and would return us to the days when people could be denied coverage bc of pre-existing conditions.

html: Spent the day visiting two child and family detention centers in Texas. Seeing all of this is one thing, but I want to be a part of coming up with solutions to reform our immigration system too. We need to stand up for kids and families.pic.twitter.com/vCuHmOj823
text: Spent the day visiting two child and family detention centers in Texas. Seeing all of this is one thing, but I want to be a part of coming up with solutions to reform our immigration system too. We need to stand up for kids and families.pic.twitter.com/vCuHmOj823

html: I think no matter what you think about immigration policy, we can all agree this level of human suffering is unconscionable. Please keep sharing these stories.
text: I think no matter what you think about immigration policy, we can all agree this level of human suffering is unconscionable. Please keep sharing these stories.

html: There’s a secret lingo that pharma uses to rake in profits at the expense of patients: Sandbox=Market for generics Fair Share=Divide the pie so profits go up Trash the Market=Selling at a ↓ price than agreed on in back-room deals We need to hold these companies accountable.https://twitter.com/washingtonpost/status/1072111488846958592 …
text:
There’s a secret lingo that pharma uses to rake in profits at the expense of patients: 

Sandbox=Market for generics
Fair Share=Divide the pie so profits go up
Trash the Market=Selling at a ↓ price than agreed on in back-room deals 

We need to hold these companies accountable.https://twitter.com/washingtonpost/status/1072111488846958592 …

html: At first glance, the EPA’s #RFS Rule may look ok. But the devil is in the details. It fails to crack down on bogus waivers that big refineries use to exempt themselves from RFS standards. This abuse will destroy biofuel demand, and hurt Minnesota ag and our economy.
text:
At first glance, the EPA’s #RFS Rule may look ok. But the devil is in the details. 

It fails to crack down on bogus waivers that big refineries use to exempt themselves from RFS standards. This abuse will destroy biofuel demand, and hurt Minnesota ag and our economy.

html: If you think Americans have a right for their pharmacist to tell them if they are being overcharged for meds: today was a good day. The Patient Right to Know Drug Prices Act just passed the House, which means it is headed for POTUS's desk. Proud to have fought for this.
text:
If you think Americans have a right for their pharmacist to tell them if they are being overcharged for meds: today was a good day. 

The Patient Right to Know Drug Prices Act just passed the House, which means it is headed for POTUS's desk. Proud to have fought for this.

html: Glad to say the Senate passed a bill I cosponsored to save patients $. It prohibits middlemen from incl. clauses in contracts that keep pharmacists from telling you when you can save $ on Rx drugs by paying cash instead of insurance. One of many steps necessary to ↓ Rx costs.
